devdoc.author: Daniel Chilvers*

approveLendingPool(address,address,uint2.details: this needs to be called for each new asset purchased

params._max: if true ignore _amount and approve for a large amount
params._userVault: the address of the user vault

deposit(address,address,uint256,address).details: User must have approved this contract before this is called

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,uint256,address).details: put these transfers into require statements

devdoc.title: Manages depositing and withdrawing from Aave

approveLendingPool(address,address,uint2.notice: Approves sending _asset ERC20 tokens to the lendingPool
